text: Trust that everything happens for a reason. This mindset will help you see the lessons behind your difficult circumstances. A bigger force is watching your steps; never forget that.

text: The Universe is not ignoring you, you just have to be sure of what you truly want, and once you decided on it, the Universe will conspire you to get it.

author: JFKIb
text:
Today’s Affirmation:

"Luck is on my side, and I live my life optimistically."

author: JFKIb
text: May this new month bring you the courage to take action on your desires and inspirations.

author: JFKIb
text: Be open and the Universe will guide you through portals of magic.

text: I know y’all in disguise

author: JFKIb
text: Listen to your inner self. Life is too short to stay in our comfort zone.

text: the only impossible journey is the one you never begin

text: know what you’re supposed to do and do it

author: JFKIb
text: Make happiness a daily choice and do the little simple things that bring you joy.

text: Take note of the people you keep close to you, and ruminate on the effect that each one has in your life.

text: you cannot be like them, you can only be like you so fuck them and embrace you https://t.co/5BKcgPEH2L

author: JFKIb
text: Don’t let outer influences dull your sparkle; add positivity into your environment and every moment will be magical.

author: JFKIb
text: You don't have to isolate yourself to discover your purpose in life.

author: JFKIb
text: Liberate yourself from your past and you will attract endless growth.

author: JFKIb
text: Never judge yourself for who you are and be yourself unapologetically. Your uniqueness will attract those who are meant to be in your colorful journey.

author: JFKIb
text:
Friendly Reminder:

Follow your inner compass and make sure to choose what nourishes your soul.

author: JFKIb
text: The more you lend yourself to use your imagination about someone, the less likely you will be able to create something real, either with them or with someone else.

author: JFKIb
text: Wherever you are right now in your journey is where you need to be. Don't stress about what you can't control or change.

author: JFKIb
text: We are never given a dream or the desire to achieve a goal without the means to do so.

author: JFKIb
text: Keep your calm and find your center.

author: JFKIb
text: Follow your heart and your inner light will guide you in this journey called life.

author: JFKIb
text: Beautiful things start to happen when you let go of control.

author: JFKIb
text: Intuition is, without a doubt, our biggest resource on the path to finding meaning, joy, and self-compassion in our lives. It is a skill to be sharpened and a muscle to be strengthened.

author: JFKIb
text: free yourself to be yourself

author: JFKIb
text: Healing sometimes involves pain and sadness, that’s when we really need to take a step back, rest, and honor what we are feeling, so that it may pass more quickly.

author: JFKIb
text: Imagination is a great tool for manifestation, but it takes action in order to fully manifest things.

author: JFKIb
text: The best part about growing into the better version of yourself is witnessing the process of your own transformation.

author: JFKIb
text: Set yourself up with the tools you need to move forward, and you will start building the strong foundation that will get you there.

author: JFKIb
text: It is your attitude that influences the choices and decisions you make; when your mind is so full of doubt and fear, you become closed-minded to the possibilities of change.

author: JFKIb
text: Owning and speaking your truth can be near impossible when your energy is bound by others’ expectations of you.

author: JFKIb
text: Stay focused and positive, speak your truth and do not be swayed by the opinions of others.

author: JFKIb
text: In order to make sure you are creating the foundation you need moving forward, focus on what’s practical.

author: JFKIb
text: Whatever progress you are looking for in your love life, career or finances, it's the choices and decisions you make now that will determine whether you achieve it or not.

author: JFKIb
text: A boat travels faster over water when its heavy burden is lightened, so take a moment to ask yourself what, or who, you may need to let go of in order to move forward more easily.
